submapp.som.Som.random_weights_initialization¶

Som.random_weights_initialization(distribution: str = None) → None¶

Initialize weights randomly

As this method (re-)initializes the weights it also calls the method clear_map_info and re-initializes is_trained to ``False``random_weights_initialization

Parameters

distribution (string, optional) – distribution “gaussian” or “uniform”. Default to None, in this case the distribution is uniform

Return type

None

See also

  • sample_weights_initialization

  • pca_weights_initialization

  • zeros_weights_initialization
